title: Powers of Ten
brief_description: The Eamses film shows a linear view of our universe – first from the human scale to the sea of galaxies, then directly down to the nucleus of a carbon atom. With images, narration and a distance register, it gives a clue to the relative size of things.

constellations_other.name: Transformations
constellations_other.description: Like many techniques born from the visual language of magic lanterns, the dissolve effect was incorporated into filmmaking and is still used today.
